quotes.quote: Welcome to the death of reasoning

You'd be in jail!

One year ago, our country was in deep trouble, but today, we're the hottest country anywhere in the world.
You have to end it now - I can tell you. I'm really good at this stuff. Your countries are going to hell.
Climate change - because if it goes higher or lower, whatever the hell happens, there's climate change.
